issue.title: vix.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://vix.com/es-es/canales/cine/channel-callsign-Z165](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvix.com%2Fes-es%2Fcanales%2Fcine%2Fchannel-callsign-Z165) ### Comment > En vix.com no carga los videos streming. He agregado reglas desde el dashboard de adguard DNS, he habilitado y deshabilitado la extensión y el sitio sigue sin funcionar. Cambio el DNS de otros por ej. 8.8.8.8 o 1.1.1.1 del dispositivo y la página funciona bien. Regreso al Adguard DNS y persiste el problema, no cargan los videos. Username: `@fbusglo` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/3mlx4eh96yw4g4cocggs84c0k00osscbu5tpcrlckg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/4u5c7uai8k2sc4k0s8sw888gkkg84s8ryddyo021pw.png?nc=1)

issue.title: sonixgvn.net
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard Content Blocker ### AdGuard version Version 4.3.64 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc. ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox, Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sonixgvn.net/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I know it is better [before](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166320). But, it looks it cover whole screen instead. What do you think? 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot N:
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition
